title: A2UI Client Capabilities Schema
description: A schema for the a2uiClientCapabilities object, which is sent from the client to the server to describe the client's UI rendering capabilities.

supportedCatalogIds.description: The URI of each of the catalogs that is supported by the client. The standard catalog for v0.8 is 'a2ui.org:standard_catalog_0_8_0'.

inlineCatalogs.description: An array of inline catalog definitions. This should only be provided if the agent declares 'acceptsInlineCatalogs: true' in its capabilities.
